events.title: Events
events.intro: Below is our calendar with upcoming activities. Follow our Facebook page for registrations and updates.

underforeninger.title: Subgroups
underforeninger.intro: DSAU has several subgroups running activities around the department. Learn more below.

board.title: Board
board.intro: The board consists of students across cohorts at Aarhus University. See members below.

about.title: About DSAU
about.body1: The Computer Science Student Association at Aarhus University is a student-run organization for CS students at AU. We represent student ideas and suggestions to the department and organize social and academic activities.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.p1: Want to arrange an event together with us for CS students? Get in touch!
contact.p2: NOTE: We charge a fee of DKK 750 for events.
contact.p3: You can reach us by email or via our Facebook page.

rc.title: Regnecentralen
rc.p1: Regnecentralen (often ‘RC’) is a community and social forum—online and a physical room—for students at Computer Science and IT Product Development at Aarhus University.

matroska.title: Matroska
matroska.p1: Matroska is a volunteer group at the Department of Computer Science which typically hosts two to three movie nights per year.
matroska.p2: Participation is free. We usually watch two movies with dinner in between, sponsored by a friendly company which also gives a short talk before the first film.
matroska.p3: Interested in joining the group? Send us an email or contact a member.
matroska.popcornLink: Want to rent the popcorn machine? See here.

popcorn.title: Rental of Matroska's popcorn machine
popcorn.intro: It is possible to borrow our popcorn machine if it is not already booked for the day by filling out the application via the link below. Please note the rules:
popcorn.li1: The popcorn machine is lent only to internal events or those affiliated with the group.
popcorn.li2: You must buy kernels, oil and cups yourself. You may use the salt in the cart.
popcorn.li3: If possible, please pick up the machine in Hopper-0 and return it cleaned.
popcorn.li4: Please write in good time. We are volunteers; response may take a while.
